params._pana: uint256 - amount of pana to add
uint256 - amount of pana to burn
params._slp: uint256 - amount of slp to burn

returns._pana: uint256 - returns amount of Pana to be added in case of add. 0 in case of burn.
returns._slp: uint256 - returns amount of SLPs to be burnt in case of burn. 0 in case of add.

burn(uint256,uint256).notice: burns Pana from the pool using SLP

getSupplyControlAmount().notice: returns the amounts of tokens to be expended for supply control
